pr_title: Include j9vrb in ddr target set

timeline.message:
Include j9vrb in ddr target set

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: @dnakamura Can you comment on whether GLOB_HEADERS is the right choice here?
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: Yes. Its generally the easiest choice to avoid having to list all the headers (and open yourself to the possibility of forgetting when new headers are added in the future)
replies.author: dnakamura
